WorkItem.ClosedComment: Your expectations are correct, this shouldn't be happening. Can you provide some additional details and re-open this issue? Are you talking about not seeing JavaScript generated when you build a project or with compile on save? Are you using Web Essentials (and its compile on save vs the official Typescript version of the feature)?
WorkItem.Description:
Having upgraded to 0911 I have found repeated instances of changes to ts files not prompting a regen of the corresponding javascript.  

Is there a non default setting I should be employing?

To solve the issue I have an instance of powershell ise running alongside vs2012 to a) verify the ts components and b) create a build...seems a little daft to me.
